Name: aluminium, ingot, primary, import from Asia (excluding China) | aluminium, primary, ingot | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/242:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals/2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/22511/documentation

This dataset represents the amount of imported primary aluminium from Asia (excluding China) to North America. The import value is valid for 2016 and includes all imports, independently whether used within the importing region, or re-exported. AA and AAC statistics

This activity represents the point of "handing over" the primary aluminium ingot from one country to the other at the border.
